name: fairseq
description: Fairseq is a comprehensive neural network toolkit for training custom models across text and audio domains, featuring implementations of state-of-the-art architectures including BART, RoBERTa, mBART, XLM-R, Transformer variants, wav2vec models, HuBERT, and many others. The toolkit supports a wide range of tasks including machine translation, language modeling, text generation, speech recognition, speech synthesis, audio classification, cross-lingual understanding, and multimodal applications.
